text: Hello, I'm in charge of everything email at a small tech startup in Oklahoma. This is my first time in an email role and I'm brand new to HubSpot so I'm constantly in learning mode.  Hopefully I'll also be able to offer help once I get more familiar with this tool (one day).
Since you’re focusing on email design and dev, I absolutely encourage you to also join <https://email.geeks.chat/>

Hi <@UHHRS0EJ1> - Hope things are going well.

This feels like a great question for the HubSpot Support team. I'd suggest giving them a call to take a look at how to resolve this. <https://help.HubSpot.com>
how can you dedicate any more focus to slack, <@U7SL518D6>?

Hello everyone! I’ve built a custom template using drag and drop feature. For mobile version, I want re-order the modules. I tried using flex-box, but it didn’t work. Is it not possible?
